headline: The Nation’s Largest Homebuilder Commands a 75% Valuation Premium Despite Lower Returns Than Its Regional Rival
summary: M/I Homes (NYSE: MHO) and D.R. Horton (NYSE: DHI) both reported challenging third quarters that revealed how differently a nimble regional builder and the nation’s largest homebuilder navigate the same storm. M/I Homes missed estimates by 10% with $3.92 EPS while delivering a record 2,296 homes. D.R. Horton saw earnings plunge 22% year-over-year despite its ... The Nation’s Largest Homebuilder Commands a 75% Valuation Premium Despite Lower Returns Than Its Regional Rival
